title: Out of breath
creator_credit: Don Anderson, Tasmanian Film Corporation and Phillip Mark-Law
brief_description: A dramatised documentary about occupational asthma. A cabinet maker is faced with the difficult choice between continuing to work in a dusty environment or improving his health.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Anderson, Tasmanian Film Corporation and Phillip Mark-Law
